hibernate-mapping.query: select it from org.egov.commons.Installment it where (it.fromDate>=? or ? between it.fromDate and it.toDate) and it.fromDate<=current_date and it.module.name=? order by it.fromDate

select inst from Installment inst,CFinancialYear finYear where inst.module.name=? and inst.fromDate >= (select fromDate from Installment where module.name=? and (? between fromDate and toDate)) and cast(inst.toDate as date) <= cast(finYear.endingDate as date) and now() between finYear.startingDate and finYear.endingDate order by inst.fromDate
